name: FX File Explorer Settings
summary: Learn about .FXCONFIG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FX File Explorer allows Android users to manage their files and navigate their device's file system. Paid users can access network- and Internet-related features, as well as an image and video gallery and an audio browser.

Users who want to transfer their FX File Explorer settings from one instance to another can save those settings as an FXCONFIG file. This file contains the user's app settings, bookmarks, and network connection settings.

description: An FXCONFIG file is a configuration file used by FX File Explorer, a third-party file manager for Android devices. It contains a list of a user's settings, bookmarks, and other configuration information.

instructions: You can open an FXCONFIG file in FX File Explorer (Android), to import the settings the file contains.
